item.title: SpecialAttack help!
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Hello,

I know this question been asking 100x but i need to make sure.
Here the problem.

I got my DClaws in my server but when i see/look at the SpecialAttack its not there wtf?
If it would help here a picture just so you dont get confused what im saying.


There your picture. (were?) is were the Spec ment to be.

And here the code for what i did to TRY make the spec show.

public void calculateSpecial() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount <= 49) { // Dragon claws specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount >= 50) { // Dragon claws startAnimation(2068); maulSpec(); specialDamage = 30 + misc.random(10); specialAmount -= 50; }

And there the code were i put it in the SpecialAttack place.

Read full topic
